Rich_McCready:
{{short description|American country music singer-songwriter (born 1970)}} {{Use mdy dates|date=May 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Rich McCready | image = | image_size = | birth_name = | alias = | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1970|02|09}} | origin = [[Seneca, Missouri]] | instrument = Guitar | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 1996–present | label = Magnatone, American Originals, KP Records | associated_acts = | website = {{official website|http://www.richmccready.com/}} }} '''Rich McCready''' (born February 9, 1970, in [[Seneca, Missouri]]{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc|page=267|year=2008|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}}) is an American [[country music]] singer-songwriter. McCready signed to Magnatone Records in 1995 and recorded two albums for the label.[{{AllMusic|class=artist|id=p173285|pure_url=yes}} Rich McCready] at [[Allmusic]] His highest-charting single, "Thinkin' Strait," peaked at number 53 in 1996.
